text: Agar tum na-shukri kero to (yaad rakho kay) Allah Taalaa tum (sab say) be-niyaz hai aur woh apnay bando ki na-shukri say khush nahi aur agar tum shukar kero to woh issay tumharay liye pasand keray ga aur koi kissi ka bojh nahi uthata phit tum sab ka lotna tumharay rab hi ki taraf hai. Tumhen woh batla dey ga jo tum kertay thay. Yaqeenan woh dilon tak ki baaton ka waqif hai
